raw:
# ODAVL Policy Configuration Sample
# Copy to .governor/config.json and adapt to JSON format

governor:
  prsPerDay: 5
  ciMinutesPerHour: 60
  maxConcurrentShadows: 3
  waves:
    - window: "22:00-06:00"
      maxPrs: 3

studio:
  telemetry: anonymized  # Options: on|anonymized|off
